definition: to act in a vulgar manner
details:
verb
- to act in a vulgar manner
= example: to act in a vulgar manner
- to debase and make vulgar
= example: to debase and make vulgar
- to cater to popular taste, in order to make popular and present to the general public
= example: to cater to popular taste, in order to make popular and present to the general public
= synonyms: generalize, generalise, popularise, popularize
